subject: p16662264
History: Prior renal transplant with recent pneumonia now presenting with pleuritic back pain for 3 days. Evaluate for pneumonia.
Findings: A right upper extremity PICC has been removed in the interim. There is obscuration of the left heart border, likely scarring from prior infection. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. The heart size is normal. The mediastinal and hilar structures are unremarkable.
Impression: Obscuration of the left heart is probably reflects scarring.
